title: "Imperial College London: Government funding to ‘revolutionise AI healthcare research'"
excerpt: "UKRI announces £13 million funding for artificial intelligence in health, with three projects launched at Imperial College London. Imperial College London researchers have been awarded almost £1.8m as part of a new stream of funding from UK Research and Innovation (UKRI) to explore how artificial intelligence (AI) can improve health research."
